<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new part supplier record for vendor management in the parts catalog.

**Workflow Example**
1. Create the supplier: [POST /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/new](/docs/api/parts/create-part-supplier) with a name.
2. Extract `Item.PartSupplierId` from the response.
3. Reference the supplier when creating parts: [POST /api/v1.0/parts/new](/docs/api/parts/create-part) with `StandardSupplierId`.
4. Verify creation: [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/\{PartSupplierId\}](/docs/api/parts/get-part-supplier-by-id).

**Minimal Required Fields**: Name.

**Notes**: Associate an address using AddressId for supplier location tracking.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Part supplier data to create.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a supplier in the legacy parts management supplier belongs to."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product module identifier."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the supplier was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the supplier was last modified."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the address","properties":{"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the address"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site this address belongs to"},"Street1":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary street address line"},"Street2":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary address line (suite, building,
